# GitHub Copilot Instructions for actias-luna.poison

## Repository Overview

This repository contains AI-powered content analysis systems:
- **HIFE (Human Insight Fusion Engine)**: Advanced AI system for analyzing written content and generating multidimensional human insight reports
- **ContentAnalyzer**: Expert content analysis system with 11 evaluation criteria

## Coding Standards

- Maintain YAML formatting for configuration files
- Follow existing file structure and naming conventions
- Preserve prompt engineering patterns and structure in AI system definitions
- Keep analysis criteria and scoring systems consistent

## Project-Specific Guidelines

- When working with HIFE or ContentAnalyzer prompts, maintain the existing format and structure
- Preserve the comprehensive evaluation frameworks and analytical methods
- Keep all system prompts and analysis modules intact unless specifically requested to modify
- Respect the human-centered, empathetic approach in HIFE's design principles

## Testing and Validation

- Validate YAML syntax for configuration files
- Test analysis prompts for clarity and completeness
- Ensure all evaluation criteria remain comprehensive and balanced

## Documentation

- Update documentation when adding new analysis modules or features
- Maintain clear descriptions of system capabilities and limitations
- Keep README.md synchronized with actual repository contents
